revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=ReadyNAS 212 |revision=(RN212D22-100) |upc=606449110913 |asin=B015S0Y4YY |newegg=N82E16822122201 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |pcb_id=2976485002 |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Annapurna Labs |cpu1_model=Alpine AL21400;AL21400-1400; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34MS01G200BHI000 |fla2=64 KiB |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L512EMI-10G |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G0846D-BYK0 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 (Type A), SATA 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=3 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, JP5 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, JP3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |eth_chip3_brand=Atheros |eth_chip3_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=I2C Real Time Clock;Intersil;ISL12057;;1;,,, 8K I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C64D;;1;,,, 2K I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C16C;;1;,,, PCIe to SATA Controller;Asmedia;ASM1060;;1;,,, 4 Port USB 3.0 Host Controller;EtronTech;EJ188H;;1;,,, Temperature Sensor and Thermal Watchdog;NXP;LM75B;;1;,,, Fan Speed Controller w/Linear or PWM Mode;GMT;G761;;1;,,, 4 Output PCIe Gen 1/2 Synthesizer;Renesas;IDT5V41186;;1;,,, 3.3V Single Port SATA2 i/m ReDriver;Pericom;PI3EQX4951ST;;1;,,, 6A, 18V Synchronous Step-down Converter;MPS;MPQ8632GLE-6;;2;,,, 2A, 1.3V–6.0V DDR Memory Termination Regulator;MPS;MP20073;;1;,,, 14A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ Eco-Mode Control;TI;TPS53319;;1;,,, 14A, 30V P-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP6679GM;;1;,,, 1.8V CMOS Operational Amplifier;TI;OPA2314;;1; |flags=eSATA, RTC w/ battery backup, LACP, SNMP, fan, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.10;alpine_db-1.49; |stock_os=Linux;4.1.30.alpine.1; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=A0:04:60 }} {{TagLine|2-Bay ReadyNAS Desktop Storage}} :[https://www.netgear.com/business/wired/storage/rn21200/ Product page] {{•}} [https://www.netgear.com/support/product/RN212.aspx Support page] :[https://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/ReadyNASOS_V6.9.6_WW_src.zip Latest GPL Source] *"2976485002" is silkscreened on the main board. *"2976485202" is silkscreened on the SATA board. *"2976492901" is silkscreened on the USB/Network board. ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Annapurna Labs]]'' Alpine AL21400 @1.4GHz Quad Core (ARM Cortex-A15) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 512KiB SPI NOR Flash, 128MB SLC NAND Flash, 2x SATA, 1x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel ==Images== ---- File:NETGEAR RN212 Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:NETGEAR RN212 Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:NETGEAR RN212 Peripheral Board Top.jpeg|Peripheral Board Top File:NETGEAR RN212 Peripheral Board Bottom.jpeg|Peripheral Board Bottom File:NETGEAR RN212 SATA Board Top.jpeg|SATA Board Top File:NETGEAR RN212 SATA Board Bottom.jpeg|SATA Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
